name: HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE
message: You can work this off using exercise
summary: Also known as hypertension. Often symptomless, this can put a strain on the arteries and heart.

name: DIABETES
summary: Cause blood sugar levels to be too high.Exists in 2 forms, type 1 and type 2. Affects about 2.9 million people in the UK.

name: HEART DISEASE
message: You may have a heart attack and die prematurely
summary: The UK's biggest killer. Occurs when the blood flow to the heart is blocked by fatty deposits on artery walls.

name: HIGH CHOLESTEROL
message: You have high cholesterol levels, which will increase your chances of a heart attack. Excerise to get rid of high cholesterol.
summary: Cholesterol is a fatty substance, and having too much of it in the body can cause lead to other serious conditions such as heart disease.

name: BACK PAIN
message: You have back pain as you're slightly overweight. Exercise can reduce this.
summary: A common affliction, which leads to pain and tension in the back. Can be caused by poor posture due to being overweight.

name: CANCER
message: You have a higher risk of cancer!
summary: A condition where body cells reproduce uncontrollably. Can affect different areas of the body, and some people are more at risk than others due to their lifestyle.

name: INFERTILITY
summary: Being overweight or underweight can impact the fertility of both men and women, leading to difficulties when trying to have childern.

name: SKIN INFECTIONS
message: These can lead to more serious issues.
summary: Skin sores caused by lack of mobility (sitting on the same area of skin for long periods). If not treated can become more serious.

name: PRESSURE ULCERS
message: These can lead to more serious issues.
summary: Caused by layers of skin being rubbed away through long contact with hard surfaces, usually because of immobility.

name: GALLSTONES
message: These can be made more serious by being overweight!
summary: Small stones usually made of cholesterol, found in the gallbladder. Usually not an issue, but being overweight can make them more serious.

name: ANOREXIA
summary: A serious eating disorder and mental health problem.
